cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 525 miles SE of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to turn northwest and then north-northwest, tracking toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Upper Texas / Southwest Louisiana coastline (near the TX-LA border)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge and Hurricane Watches confined to the upper Texas through Louisiana Gulf coast – no watches for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.warning_coast: Storm Surge Warning San Luis Pass TX to the Mouth of the Mississippi River; Hurricane Warning San Luis Pass TX to Intracoastal City LA – no warnings for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern and north-western Gulf Coast from Texas to Louisiana; interior U.S. valleys later in the period
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: None (no Puerto Rico sites listed in the 5-day wind-probability table)
